title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

text: towards the close of a long conference; "I do not play the part of a
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

text: passion,--and its end is the restoration of Rome."

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: people--it is an appeal to the people themselves. It is not in the power
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: raise themselves, but they raise not the people with them. All great
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: regenerations are the universal movement of the mass."
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: "Nay," answered Adrian, "then have we read history differently. To
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: me, all great regenerations seem to have been the work of the few, and
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: tacitly accepted by the multitude. But let us not dispute after the
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: manner of the schools. Thou sayest loudly that a vast crisis is at hand;
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: that the Good Estate (buono stato) shall be established. How? where are
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: your arms?--your soldiers? Are the nobles less strong than heretofore?
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: Is the mob more bold, more constant? Heaven knows that I speak not with
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: the prejudices of my order--I weep for the debasement of my country! I
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: am a Roman, and in that name I forget that I am a noble. But I tremble
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: at the storm you would raise so hazardously. If your insurrection
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: succeed, it will be violent: it will be purchased by blood--by the blood
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: of all the loftiest names of Rome. You will aim at a second expulsion of
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: the Tarquins; but it will be more like a second proscription of Sylla.
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: Massacres and disorders never pave the way to peace. If, on the other
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: hand, you fail, the chains of Rome are riveted for ever: an ineffectual
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: struggle to escape is but an excuse for additional tortures to the
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: slave."

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: that peculiar and sarcastic smile which has before been noted. "Shall
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: Colonna for liberty, and the Orsini for justice? My Lord, we cannot
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: appeal to the nobles against the nobles. We must not ask them to
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: moderate their power; we must restore to ourselves that power. There may
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: be danger in the attempt--but we attempt it amongst the monuments of the
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: Forum: and if we fall--we shall perish worthy of our sires! Ye have
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: high descent, and sounding titles, and wide lands, and you talk of your
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: ancestral honours! We, too,--we plebeians of Rome,--we have ours! Our
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: fathers were freemen! where is our heritage? not sold--not given away:
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: but stolen from us, now by fraud, now by force--filched from us in
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: our sleep; or wrung from us with fierce hands, amidst our cries and
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: struggles. My Lord, we but ask that lawful heritage to be restored to
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: us: to us--nay, to you it is the same; your liberty, alike, is gone. Can
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: you dwell in your father's house, without towers, and fortresses, and
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: the bought swords of bravos? can you walk in the streets at dark without
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: arms and followers? True, you, a noble, may retaliate; though we dare
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: not. You, in your turn, may terrify and outrage others; but does licence
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: compensate for liberty? They have given you pomp and power--but the
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: safety of equal laws were a better gift. Oh, were I you--were I Stephen
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: free air which comes not through bars and bulwarks against my
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: fellow-citizens, but in the open space of Heaven--safe, because
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: protected by the silent Providence of Law, and not by the lean fears
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: and hollow-eyed suspicions which are the comrades of a hated power.
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: peasant in a free state is more free than he is. Oh, my Lord, that
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: you--the brave, the generous, the enlightened--you, almost alone amidst
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: your order, in the knowledge that we had a country--oh, would that you
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: who can sympathise with our sufferings, would strike with us for their
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: redress!"

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

text: boast of our house,--how can I join thee?"
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

text: merciful to thee."
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

text: He depicted forcibly the servitude and misery of the citizens--the
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: devoted his life to the regeneration of their common country; and he
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: It created,--or rather revived, with new privileges and powers,--a
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: one that seems simple enough to our happier times, but never hitherto
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: be suffered to maintain fortifications and garrisons in the city or the
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: country; that the gates and bridges of the State should be under the
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: control of whomsoever should be elected Chief Magistrate. It forbade all
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: harbour of brigands, mercenaries, and robbers, on payment of a thousand
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: marks of silver; and it made the Barons who possessed the neighbouring
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

text: to assemble to the protection of the State. It ordained, that in each
title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
author: Lytton, Edward Bulwer Lytton, Baron

title: Rienzi, the Last of the Roman Tribunes
